name: Great Wall
description: Great Wall has been around for a while now, but they're mostly known for their take out. We dropped by for lunch to see how they match up against the growing number of Chinese restaurants in Colombo.
tip: If you're trying to decide between the Special friend rice and chicken fried rice, we suggest you go with the latter since it's cheaper, and there's hardly any noticeable between the two.
review:
Great Wall has been around for a while now, but they're mostly known for their take out. We dropped by for lunch to see how they match up against the growing number of Chinese restaurants in Colombo.
Their executive lunch is a good yet uninspired option for a one-off office lunch in a hungry spot.

සෙට් එකත් එක්ක බම්බලපිටියේ හන්දියේ කැරකෙන වෙලාවක, ෆුඩ් කෝර්ට් කෑම දිරවන්නේ නැත්තන්, ශේප් එකේ චයිනීස් පාරක් දාන්න කිට්ටු කරන්න හොඳ තැනක් තමයි මේ.
